CustomField.description: This field is to let Deal classification know what the end-customer, partner and NCR relationship is for this opportunity
CustomField.label: Enablement

value.fullName: High - Partner contributes more then 6% GM or owns contract or fulfills customer requirement
value.label: High - Partner contributes more then 6% GM or owns contract or fulfills customer requirement

value.fullName: Low - Partner contributes less then 6% GM
value.label: Low - Partner contributes less then 6% GM
